attributes.title: Very not good
attributes.review:
This app is not good at all it is completely filling my phone with spam. Not like ads but like the canned food. It’s disgusting I can’t even touch my phone right. Oh god, coming tho right screen, send help aaaaaaaaaa

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app literally took days to download and when it did, it made my whole phone lagging. All I wanted to do was support our cheeto president but I couldn’t because of his app. If this app is any indication on how he’s gonna run out country in 2020, you can count my vote on Biden

attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE ENTIRE UNIVERSE!
attributes.review: I downloaded it in order to see if my perspective of the president would change, but instead it worsened it. It is the worst app that I have ever came across and I hope no one has to go through this horrid experience. I still have nightmares thinking about it🤬

attributes.title: Not user friendly😤
attributes.review: This app is not friendly to the user and should be taken off the App Store, this app also comes with countless glitches that make it very hard slow and annoying to use😤

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: If I could rate this app 0 stars I would. After I downloaded it, it occurred to me that I downloaded a homophobic and a racists app. After that I also noticed that it hacked all of my information and my phone wasn’t working. Do not recommend!❤️

attributes.title: worst app EVER
attributes.review: this app is terrible. i was looking forward to sharing this wonderful app about president trump with my friends and family, but when i tried to open the app, it completely blacked out. now my phone isn’t working and i need to get a new one. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!

this app was the worst... after it took a week to download when it was fully downloaded it deleted ALL of my apps and erased all of my data, then proceeded to infect my phone with a unnatural virus which had my phone shutdown for days on end. say it with me “this app is AWFUL”

attributes.title: this app was TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: this app was terrible!!!! i opened the app and it was fine besides the ugly photo but then i logged in and it hacked my phone and my tv it started playing news stations i didn’t know and a lot of other things and the app was very slow DO NOT GET IT

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and when it finally did, it rearranged all my apps and I had no idea where anything was and then I started getting random phone calls and all in all just a bad experience

attributes.title: This app 😤
attributes.review: I wanted to keep up with things on this app. But when the app takes FOREVER to download, I can’t do that. Very disappointed that the only way I can get information is from the news channels. But they make stuff up all the time!
